member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.CollectionRegistration`1
member.summary: Allows child components to register with an owner component via this class shared as a cascading value & parameter.
member.param: Action to call the StateHasChanged method. Due to a server prerendering issue in .NET 5, the StateHasChanged must be called inside InvokeAsync, so the action is awaitable.
Function to return if the holding component is disposed.
Callback to call when the component is added to the collection.
Callback to call when the component is removed from the collection.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.CollectionRegistration`1.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{`0},System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task},System.Func{System.Boolean},System.Action{`0},System.Action{`0})
member.summary: Allows child components to register with an owner component via this class shared as a cascading value & parameter.
member.param: Action to call the StateHasChanged method. Due to a server prerendering issue in .NET 5, the StateHasChanged must be called inside InvokeAsync, so the action is awaitable.
Function to return if the holding component is disposed.
Callback to call when the component is added to the collection.
Callback to call when the component is removed from the collection.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.CollectionRegistration`1.Register(`0)
member.summary: Registers with the collection and calls the state has changed.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.CollectionRegistration`1.UnregisterAsync(`0)
member.summary: Unregisters from the collection and calls the state has changed (when the owner is not disposed).

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.CssClassHelper
member.summary: Helper for working with CSS classes.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.CssClassHelper.Combine(System.String[])
member.summary: Join class names to one class attribute value (using space as a separator). Null or empty items in cssClasses argument are ignored.
member.example: For "btn btn-primary", null, "bt-lrg" returns "btn btn-primary bt-lrg".

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Debouncer
member.summary: Debouncer helps you to debounce asynchronous actions. You can use it in your callbacks to prevent multiple calls of the same action in a short period of time.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Debouncer.DebounceAsync(System.Int32,System.Func{System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Starts the debouncing.
member.param: The delay in milliseconds for debouncing.
The asynchronous action to be executed. The gets canceled if the method is called again.

member.summary: URL of the server endpoint receiving the files.

member.summary: HTTP Method (verb) used for file upload. The default is POST.

member.summary: Single false or multiple true files upload.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxInputFileCore.Enabled
member.summary: Make the item appear disabled by setting to false. The default is true.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxInputFileCore.Accept
member.summary: Takes as its value a comma-separated list of one or more file types, or unique file type specifiers, describing which file types to allow. MDN Web Docs - HTML attribute: accept.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxInputFileCore.MaxFileSize
member.summary: The maximum file size in bytes. When exceeded, the returns 413-RequestEntityTooLarge as . The default is long.MaxValue (unlimited).

member.summary: The maximum number of concurrent uploads. The default is 6.

member.summary: The input element id.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxInputFileCore.StartUploadAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Initiates the upload (does not wait for upload completion). Use OnUploadCompleted event.
member.param: Authorization Bearer Token to be used for upload (i.e. use IAccessTokenProvider).
member.remarks: We do not want to make the Havit.Blazor library dependent on WebAssembly libraries (IAccessTokenProvider and such). Therefor the accessToken here...

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode
member.summary: Enum for HTML input modes.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Text
member.summary: Standard input keyboard for the user's current locale.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.None
member.summary: No virtual keyboard. For when the page implements its own keyboard input control.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Decimal
member.summary: Fractional numeric input keyboard containing the digits and decimal separator for the user's locale (typically . or ,). Devices may or may not show a minus key (-).

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Numeric
member.summary: Numeric input keyboard, but only requires the digits 0–9. Devices may or may not show a minus key.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Tel
member.summary: A telephone keypad input, including the digits 0–9, the asterisk (*), and the pound (#) key. Inputs that *require* a telephone number should typically use InputType.Tel instead.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Search
member.summary: A virtual keyboard optimized for search input. For instance, the return/submit key may be labeled "Search", along with possible other optimizations. Inputs that require a search query should typically use InputType.Search instead.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Email
member.summary: A virtual keyboard optimized for entering email addresses. Typically includes the @ character as well as other optimizations. Inputs that require email addresses should typically use InputType.Email instead.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Url
member.summary: A keypad optimized for entering URLs. This may have the / key more prominent, for example. Enhanced features could include history access and so on. Inputs that require a URL should typically use InputType.Url instead.

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType
member.summary: Enum for HTML input types.
member.remarks: As the enum is currently used only for HxInputText and HxInputNumber components, only relevant types are included.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType.Text
member.summary: A single-line text field. Line-breaks are automatically removed from the input value.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType.Email
member.summary: A field for editing an email address. It looks like a input, but has validation parameters and a relevant keyboard in supporting browsers and devices with dynamic keyboards.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType.Password
member.summary: A single-line text field whose value is obscured. It will alert the user if the site is not secure.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType.Search
member.summary: A single-line text field for entering search strings. Line-breaks are automatically removed from the input value. It may include a delete icon in supporting browsers that can be used to clear the field. It displays a search icon instead of the enter key on some devices with dynamic keypads.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType.Tel
member.summary: A control for entering a telephone number. It displays a telephone keypad on some devices with dynamic keypads.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType.Url
member.summary: A field for entering a URL. It looks like a input, but has validation parameters and a relevant keyboard in supporting browsers and devices with dynamic keyboards.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType.Number
member.summary: A control for entering a number. Displays a numeric keypad in some devices with dynamic keypads.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.ModelCloner.Clone``1(``0)
member.summary: Returns a model clone. Uses strategies (in order): * * C# Records * Object.MemberwiseClone

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxChangeTracker
member.summary: Subscribes to INotifyPropertyChanged changes and triggers re-rendering of ChildContent. To be used when you want to limit the scope of re-rendering and prevent re-rendering of a wider component.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxChangeTracker.ChildContent
member.summary: The content to which the value should be provided.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxChangeTracker.Value
member.summary: The value to be tracked.

member.summary:
Renders an element with the specified name, attributes, and child content.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxDynamicElement

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement.ElementName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the element to render.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement.OnClick
member.summary: Raised after the element is clicked.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement.InvokeOnClickAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Triggers the event. Allows interception of the event in derived components.
member.remarks: Please note, that this method is not called, when the parameter is not set.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement.OnClickStopPropagation
member.summary: Stops onClick event propagation. Default is false.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement.OnClickPreventDefault
member.summary: Prevents the default action for the onclick event. Default is false.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement.ElementRef
member.summary: Element reference.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement.ElementRefChanged
member.summary: Action (synchronous, not an EventCallback) called when the element's reference is captured.

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRedirectTo
member.summary:
Rendering a HxRedirectTo will navigate to a new location.
Can be used in AuthorizeRouteView, Router and similar components to redirect to a login page, error page, or similar.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxRedirectTo

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRedirectTo.Uri
member.summary: URI to navigate to.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRedirectTo.ForceLoad
member.summary:
If true, bypasses client-side routing and forces the browser to load the new page from the server, regardless of whether the URI would normally be handled by the client-side router.
Default is false.

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1
member.summary:
A data-bound list component that allows custom layout by repeating a specified template for each item displayed in the list. Analogous to the ASP.NET WebForms Repeater control.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxRepeater

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: The template that defines how the header section of the Repeater component is displayed. Renders only if there are any items to display.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1.ItemTemplate
member.summary: The template that defines how items in the Repeater component are displayed.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1.FooterTemplate
member.summary: The template that defines how the footer section of the Repeater component is displayed. Renders only if there are any items to display.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1.NullTemplate
member.summary: The template that defines what should be rendered in case of Items being null.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1.EmptyTemplate
member.summary: The template that defines what should be rendered in case of empty Items.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1.Data
member.summary: The items to be rendered.

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxIcon
member.summary:
Displays an icon. Currently supports Bootstrap icons through the BootstrapIcon class.
Full documentation and demos can be found at https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxIcon. You can easily add your own icon set.

member.summary: Returns text from an item based on the textSelector. When the textSelector is null, it returns item.ToString(). It never returns null. Instead, null values are converted to an empty string.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.SelectorHelpers.GetValue``2(System.Func{``0,``1},``0)
member.summary: When the item is null, it returns default(TValue). Otherwise, it returns the value from the item based on the valueSelector. When the valueSelector is null and TValue is the same as TItem, it returns the item.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddHxServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Adds services needed for HAVIT Blazor library.

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2
member.summary: Abstract base-class for implementation of your own dictionary-style static data store.
member.remarks: Uses an in-memory Dictionary to store the data. Does not preload data; the data is loaded within the first data-retrieval call. Does not implement any memory-release logic; the data is refreshed within data-retrievals where returns true.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.LoadDataAsync
member.summary: Template method to implement the data retrieval logic. You should never call this method directly; use to load data. This method is sequential (does not allow parallel runs); just take care of the data retrieval. Must return a non-null value; use Enumerable.Empty if needed.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.KeySelector
member.summary: Template selector to be used when building the dictionary from retrieved data.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.IsLoaded
member.summary: Indicates whether the store has valid data.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.ShouldRefresh
member.summary:
Template method to implement your own logic of data expiration/refresh. Gets called within all data-retrieval calls to check for refreshment need.
Can be implemented as "=> false" if you do not want the data to ever expire.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.GetAllAsync
member.summary: Returns all data from the store (includes data load if needed).

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.GetAll(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns all data from the store (requires to be called first).

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.GetByKeyAsync(`0)
member.summary: Retrieves a value from the dictionary (includes data load if needed). Throws an exception when the key is not found.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.GetByKey(`0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a value from the dictionary (requires to be called first). Throws an exception when the key is not found.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.GetByKeyOrDefaultAsync(`0,`1)
member.summary: Retrieves a value from the dictionary (includes data load if needed). Returns default when not found.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.GetByKeyOrDefault(`0,`1,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a value from the dictionary (requires to be called first). Returns defaultValue when not found.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.Clear
member.summary: Throws away all the data.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.EnsureDataAsync
member.summary:
To be called before any data-retrieval to load/refresh the data.
Is automatically called before all asynchronous data-retrieval calls. You have to call this method on your own (e.g. in OnInitializedAsync) before calling any synchronous API.
Uses to check for refreshment request. Uses a lock to prevent multiple parallel loads.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.RefreshDataAsync
member.summary: Refreshes the data. Discards all the data (if any) and loads it again.

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.IDictionaryStaticDataStore`2
member.summary: Base interface for Blazor dictionary-based static data stores.

member.summary:
To be called before any data retrieval to load/refresh the data.

member.summary: Returns the localized value when resourceType is not null (value used as the resource name). Otherwise, returns the value (without attempting to get the localized value).
